statements: SELECT * FROM RecyclingCenterInventory;
SELECT MaterialType, MaterialQuantity FROM RecyclingCenterInventory;
SELECT MaterialID, MaterialType, MaterialQuantity FROM RecyclingCenterInventory WHERE MaterialQuantity > 100;
SELECT MaterialType FROM RecyclingCenterInventory WHERE MaterialID = 1;
SELECT MaterialID, MaterialType, MaterialQuantity FROM RecyclingCenterInventory ORDER BY MaterialType DESC;
SELECT MaterialType, MaterialQuantity FROM RecyclingCenterInventory
SELECT MaterialType FROM RecyclingCenterInventory WHERE MaterialQuantity > 100
SELECT * FROM RecyclingCenterInventory ORDER BY MaterialQuantity DESC
SELECT MaterialType, SUM(MaterialQuantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM RecyclingCenterInventory GROUP BY MaterialType
SELECT MaterialType, MaterialQuantity FROM RecyclingCenterInventory WHERE MaterialQuantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM Materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM Materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM Materials WHERE material_type = 'Metal';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM Materials JOIN Inventory ON Materials.material_id = Inventory.material_id;
SELECT * FROM Materials ORDER BY material_name DESC, material_id ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM Materials WHERE material_type='Metal' OR material_type='Plastic' ORDER BY material_name;
SELECT material_id, material_name, AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity FROM Materials JOIN Inventory ON Materials.material_id = Inventory.material_id GROUP BY material_id, material_name;
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Materials JOIN Inventory ON Materials.material_id = Inventory.material_id GROUP BY material_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Materials WHERE material_type IN ('Metal', 'Wood') ORDER BY material_type DESC, material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM glass;
SELECT location, quantity FROM glass;
SELECT glass_id, quantity, location FROM glass WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM plastic ORDER BY color DESC;
SELECT paper_id, size FROM paper WHERE quantity < 100;
SELECT * FROM glass WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY glass_id DESC
SELECT glass_id, location FROM glass WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM plastic WHERE color = 'blue' OR color = 'green' ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT plastic_id, color, weight FROM plastic WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY color DESC, weight ASC
SELECT * FROM paper WHERE size LIKE '%A4%'
SELECT * FROM Glass;
SELECT glass_type, quantity FROM Glass;
SELECT * FROM Plastic ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT plastic_type, quantity FROM Plastic WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT paper_type, quantity FROM Paper WHERE paper_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_id DESC
SELECT material_id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE material_id IN (SELECT paper_id FROM Paper) AND quantity < 50
SELECT glass_type, quantity FROM Inventory JOIN Glass ON Inventory.material_id = Glass.glass_id WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT paper_type, quantity FROM Inventory JOIN Paper ON Inventory.material_id = Paper.paper_id WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY paper_type ASC
SELECT Plastic.plastic_type, Inventory.quantity FROM Plastic INNER JOIN Inventory ON Plastic.plastic_id = Inventory.material_id WHERE Inventory.quantity <= 30
SELECT * FROM glass_materials;
SELECT id, glass_type FROM glass_materials WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT glass_type, quantity FROM glass_materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, plastic_type FROM plastic_materials WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY plastic_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM paper_materials WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM glass_materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY glass_type DESC;
SELECT paper_type, quantity FROM paper_materials WHERE quantity < 50 AND paper_type LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT plastic_type, quantity FROM plastic_materials WHERE plastic_type = 'PET' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory INNER JOIN transactions ON inventory.id = transactions.material_id WHERE transaction_type = 'INBOUND' AND quantity_change > 0;
SELECT DISTINCT material_id, SUM(quantity_change) AS total_change FROM transactions GROUP BY material_id HAVING total_change < 0 ORDER BY total_change ASC;
